pkgmetadata.longdescription: Twitter Collector and Export to 'SQLite', 'postGIS' and 'GIS' Format // This is an improved implementation of the package 'StreamR' to capture tweets and store it into a SQLite and 'postGIS' data base. The package simplifies the configuration task to capture tweets and facilitates its store into a 'PostGIS' database. Also exports tweets to 'GIS' format.
